title: (x) Elusive ampersand in Cubitt & West logo - DTL Documenta {Angel}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415062626im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_3859.gif)

Beautiful ampersand, I suspect it may be custom but wondered if any of you lovely people have seen it anywhere elese?

Thanks,

Jordan
author: Jordan Harper

comments.content: The lettering is DTL Caspari which narrows down the search to... DTL Documenta Regular Italic for the ampersand. You can see it in the preview pages and in the PDF file at [http://www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415062626/http:/www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/ "http://www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/")
I salute you, Angel -- brilliant work. Many thanks.
